story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1101_0100_20:
Both competitors are down to their last
Pokémon!
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I must admit, I didn’t expect you to push me
this far.
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I suppose it makes sense Red acknowledged
you as his rival.
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_0400_10: WE’RE gonna win in the end!
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_0600_10: We’ll end this battle once and for all!
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_0700_10: ’Bout time you threw in the towel, Giovanni!
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Hm... Yes, if this continues, it would be quite
inconvenient for me.
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_1000_10: Hey, cut it out! You’re hurting him!
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_1100_10:
That said, my Pokémon believes in me—and
has accepted the power, has it not?
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_1200_10: THESE are the bonds of evil!
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_1300_10: Look how delighted the crowd is.
story_arceus_07_09000/2401_1001_1400_10:
This kind of raw, overwhelming power is
what people are drawn to!
